review: We were looking for a way to add Netflix to our TV and decided to try Amazon Fire TV.  The setup was very easy and quick.  All we needed to purchase was an HDMI cable.  Once we setup the box, we download Netflix and began watching movies!  Also, Amazon Prime movie/TV selection is amazing!!  There is TV series, exercise channels, cartoons, movies . . .  a huge selection!  Now we have tons of shows to watch.  We have begun watching The Sopranos from the beginning of the series!  Amazon Fire has opened up a world of movies and TV shows that are free with the Amazon Prime account.  The voice control remote works great to quickly find a show.  We are so happy with Amazon Fire TV!  We love it and would highly recommend it!

review: I've had Amazon's Fire TV now for about 8 months, and I like it a lot! I shopped around and read reviews before I made a final decision. The reason I chose Fire over some of the other popular devices is because since joining Amazon I've had positive experiences consistently. The products, value, convenience, ease, and choices are great overall. Another main reason I chose it is because of the wide selection of movies and shows Amazon offers--many of them free if you're a Prime member. A lot of the American Experience flicks are not only free, they're entertaining and educational. Movies I can't find anywhere else I can find on Amazon. In addition to the movie/show choices is the EASE of using Fire TV. It's simple to connect and start using--even without reading the instructions. I've never had to contact support, but from reading reviews a lot of people said Amazon had very good support services. Did I say how EASY it is to use? Once its hooked up to your TV using HDMI cable (it's like putting a puzzle together--just plug it in where it fits) you just turn on your TV, hit the HDMI button on remote, click the "home" icon on Fire TV remote and start browsing shows. I am very satisfied, and would definitely purchase again if I had it to do over!
